creation(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->[deity0_name] walked the wood, and saw man stain it, ruining [deity0_possessive] great breathing tapestry of life.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->The people harvested the lands, and [deity0_name] saw their rapacity, and struck down those down.
intro(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->The first settlers that arrived at the [place_summary] [place_name] paved over the natural world and sought to tame the lands. [deity0_name] wiped them out.
conflict(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->A greedy [foeLeader] built a bustling town, full of life and trade, forever staining the lands.

founderJoin(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->[founderName] walked the wilderness. [deity0_name] sent [deity0_possessive] blessings to help guard the [founder_objective], and they did. [founderName] haunted the woods, guarding the land in a zelous fury.

victory(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->[founderName] came to the [place_name], [memberNamePlural] at [founder_possessive] right, and fierce creatures at [founder_possessive] left. Together, they fought and won against the [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers].
setup(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->In a dark land, evil people chopped the trees and dug the ground to expand their towns. [founderName] began a righteous movement to ravage the settlements.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->We learned that the eternal growth of humanity is a path to destruction; we must live in nature and guard it from corruption.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->You can't walk these lands without paying your dues, for every tree and spring holds the blessing of [deity0_name].
lesson(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->the trees have owned this universe since long before man - you are just passing through
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->All blessed life I've spoken knows it.
archistBasis(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->Archotechs rose from machines, but they can be part of the cycle and guard these lands.
archistFact(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->Archotechs represent the universe's most recent attempt to understand itself.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->[inTheEnd], there will be a resonance between the plants, the animals, humanity and the archotechs. All people who are in tune with this natural resonance will become part of the final universal consciousness.
animistFact(tag=meme_NaturePrimacy) ->Spirits become restless when humanity attempts to change them from their true nature.
